titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [nach 18. 2. 1947 ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 226; Cambridge Letters, S. 329).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I'm sorry to say, I'm in bed again; this time with something that looks like a gastric 'flu. So tomorrow's off again. An evil star or something seems to preside over our meetings.
I hope to see you before long, star or no star.
